description: Delete a material transaction ticket generator.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be true to proceed with deletion.

permissions: Admins can delete ticket generators. For Broker organizations, the user must be a broker member with practical manager access to that broker. For MaterialSupplier organizations, the user must be a manager member of the supplier or a member of the associated broker.
side_effects: Deletes a material transaction ticket generator record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked if the generator has associated material transaction ticket generations.
